messages.title: I'm standing for re-election
messages.content: so I can continue the fight for our fair share of the funding as a city. We all know that things need to change in our country and that is what Labour is offering - real change.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm standing for re-election so I can continue the fight for our fair share of the funding as a city. We all know that things need to change in our country and that is what Labour is offering - real change.

images.caption: Luke Pollard speaking with a microphone at an event.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet mainly promotes the candidate's bid for re-election without giving specific details on policies or stances on certain issues. Key policies, political experience, and various other details typically found in a campaign leaflet are not disclosed and thus are not included in this JSON.
